      • createShared

        public static Neo4jClient createShared(Vertx vertx,
                                       Neo4jClientOptions config)
        Same as createShared(io.vertx.reactivex.core.Vertx, io.reactiverse.neo4j.options.Neo4jClientOptions) but with a default data source name
        Parameters:
        vertx - the Vert.x instance
        config - the driver configuration
        Returns:
        the client

      • createShared

        public static Neo4jClient createShared(Vertx vertx,
                                       Neo4jClientOptions config,
                                       String dataSourceName)
        Creates a Neo4j client that shares its driver session with any other client having the same name.
        Parameters:
        vertx - the Vert.x instance
        config - the driver configuration
        dataSourceName - the data source name
        Returns:
        the client

      • createNonShared

        public static Neo4jClient createNonShared(Vertx vertx,
                                          Neo4jClientOptions config)
        Creates a Neo4j client which maintains its own driver session.

        It is not recommended to create several non shared clients in an application.

        Parameters:
        vertx - the Vert.x instance
        config - the driver configuration
        Returns:
        the client

        public Neo4jClient begin(Handler<AsyncResult<Neo4jTransaction>> resultHandler)
        Begins a new transaction
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the current Neo4jClient instance
